attributes.action: Set up a "watchdog" to detect Conspiracies against the current UK Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that any incumbent UK Government and Prime Minister should be aware that there are forces with infuences within the UK, that can, using the press to selectively publish facts - effectively taint the voting public's view of the legislative performance of the current Government.

I feel that this is efectively a coup by an influential minority and as such should be countered vigorously but openly

rejection.details: The UK has security services and a police force for such matters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
